### 0.3.0

#### 0.3.0
 - Supports [Vuex strict mode](https://vuex.vuejs.org/en/strict.html)
#### 0.2.2
 - Use lodash.merge instead of deep-assign
 - [FIX] use merge for reducer too
 - fully supports IE8 now

#### 0.2.1
 - Change Object.assign to deep-assign (fix #6)
